price: A nuk u ka vajtur ndonjëherë në mendje atyre[112] se shoku i tyre[113] nuk ka kurrfarë marrëzie?! Ai është vetëm paralajmërues i hapët.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: awalam yatafakkarū mā biṣāḥibihim min jinnatin in huwa illā nadhīrun mubīnun
